title: WTT-My Walter Johnson & Christy Mathewson t206's for your Ty Cobb's
author: daves_resale_shop

posts.post_title: WTT-My Walter Johnson & Christy Mathewson t206's for your Ty Cobb's
posts.post_content:
I have the following in beater condition... 

I have had them for quite some time... kind of bored with them at the moment & would be interested (if anyone else is) in making a trade for a cobb t206... ideally looking for similar condition, and interested in all poses outside of the Red...

I have the following:
Christy Mathewson: Portrait
Christy Mathewson: White Cap
Christy Mathewson: Dark Cap
Walter Johnson: Portrait
Walter Johnson: Ready to pitch

Thanks for looking! 

Please pm me if interested!
 
Best regards,
David
Still looking for a pair of cobbies if anyone is interested.

PM sent regarding the Johnsons.

Matt
